title: BNPL merchant verification certificates
dataVerified: Merchant name, business details, BNPL provider, approval date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Merchants prove BNPL partnership to customers. Domain binding verifies BNPL provider (Affirm, Afterpay, Klarna). Prevents fake "Pay in 4" offers. Consumer trust. Fraud prevention (fake BNPL checkout pages).
